name: Alpha Spider Solitaire - Unlimited FreeCell plus Spades Saga
name_original: Alpha Spider Solitaire - Unlimited FreeCell plus Spades Saga
description:
Spider Solitaire is a game that requires your intelligence and patience! You can play it anywhere at any time to entertain and challenge yourself.

Its goal is to place 2 decks of cards in suit from King to Ace. You can either play the easy 1-suit (Easy) games, or challenge the 2-suit (Medium) and 4-suit (Hard) ones. They will surely bring you a great sense of achievement and endless fun!

Features:
-Three different levels of difficulty
-Amazing achievement list
-Multiple stunning backgrounds
-Special coins system
-Unlimited hints and undo
-Clear explanation of rules
-Delightful music & sound effect
-Simple page & operational ease
